#labels Featured
= Source code =

The GCMUtils source code is available at github: [https://github.com/jarlehansen/gcmutils]

The following modules are included:
|| gcm-client-sample || Simple Android project using GCMUtils ||
|| gcm-client-utils || Main library jar-file ||
|| gcm-client-utils-test || Tests for the gcm-client-utils ||
|| gcm-common-utils || Constants used by the library, useful for both server (if Java) and client app ||
|| gcm-manifest-utils || Work in progress, not read ||
